title: Former Vigilante Campaigns In Dangerous Mexican State Ahead Of Sunday's Election
teaser: Hipolito Mora, who began a vigilante movement in the restive state of Michoacan, has not only laid down arms, but wants to be the local congressman. He was jailed twice for murder but was released.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
